Erik Gregg
605.472
Term Project 4
4/1/11

// Original Data
01000101 00000011 00000000 00111010 00000011 11111000 00000000 00000000
00000100 00000110 11100010 00110011 11001000 00001111 11001001 00000111
11011111 00010100 11011101 00010101 00000011 11011111 00000000 00010101
00000000 00000000 00000001 00011111 00000000 00000000 00000111 11010000
01010000 00001000 00000011 11101000 01110011 00100010 00000000 00000000
11110011 01100101 01100011 01110010 01100101 01110100 10100000 11101101
01100101 11110011 11110011 11100001 11100111 01100101 10100000 11110011
01101001 01111000

01000101                            // 0x45 = IPv4, 
                                    // IP header length = 5 words
00000011                            // Differentiated Services
00000000 00111010                   // Total length     = 0x003A == 58
00000011 11111000                   // Identification   = 0x03F8
000                                 // Flags - DF       = 0
                                    //         MF       = 0
00000 00000000                      // Fragment Offset (no fragmentation)
00000100                            // TTL              = 4
00000110                            // Protocol         = 6, TCP
11100010 00110011                   // Header Checksum  = 0xE233
11001000 00001111 11001001 00000111 // Source IP        = 200.15.201.7
11011111 00010100 11011101 00010101 // Dest IP          = 223.20.221.21

// IP SDU
00000011 11011111 00000000 00010101 00000000 00000000 00000001 00011111
00000000 00000000 00000111 11010000 01010000 00001000 00000011 11101000
01110011 00100010 00000000 00000000 11110011 01100101 01100011 01110010
01100101 01110100 10100000 11101101 01100101 11110011 11110011 11100001
11100111 01100101 10100000 11110011 01101001 01111000

// IP header = 20 bytes
// IP SDU = 38 bytes
// Total length valid.
